name: Universe T
description:
This game was made in two days for the 26th edition of the GM(48) game jam.
During that time I also had my intake exam for a game design university, so this is the result...

The themes for me were "Helpful But Harmful" and "It's a Jungle out there", I also had to include a timer and powerups.

The game is about eating fruits until you can jump to the moon, and not wasting your time or something deep like that.

If I make a full game out of this I'll put it here, keep waiting for now.
